messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] castle blocks
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/25/04 1:16:00 PM, Mattamandab@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/25/04 1:16:00 PM, Mattamandab@... writes:

<< Sandra or anyone who knows,
Awhile ago there was a discussion about castle blocks. My son has just
gotten into castles and stuff. I just got one of the old fisher price
castles and
guys off ebay but I want to check out those castle blocks, they sounded cool
but he wasn't into that at the time so I didn't really take in the info.
Could
someone tell me where to find them again. >>

Sorry, I had skipped a bunch of e-mail while I was out of town.

The blocks we have are from Spain and I don't remember the name of the
company. There are guest-kids sleeping up there where they are, and maybe someone
answered this already anyway.

I'd just maybe go with Lego knights and castles stuff because you'll be able
to find more later.

Sandra

messages.subject: castle blocks
messages.msgSnippet: Never mind! I just found it in the archives after a little confusion.  They look really cool, perhaps they will be coming soon to our house. Amanda [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
Never mind!
I just found it in the archives after a little confusion. They look really
cool, perhaps they will be coming soon to our house. Amanda

messages.subject: castle blocks
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra or anyone who knows, Awhile ago there was a discussion about castle blocks.  My son has just gotten into castles and stuff.  I just got one of the old
messages.messageBody:
Sandra or anyone who knows,
Awhile ago there was a discussion about castle blocks. My son has just
gotten into castles and stuff. I just got one of the old fisher price castles and
guys off ebay but I want to check out those castle blocks, they sounded cool
but he wasn't into that at the time so I didn't really take in the info. Could
someone tell me where to find them again.
Thanks so much!
Amanda, whose son has a birthday coming up and wants a cool present


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
